gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls
Class ControlCheckboxCombobox

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI.ActiveJPanel
                      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ViewControl
                          gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.CheckedControl
                              gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ControlCheckboxCombobox
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ControlCheckboxCombobox
extends CheckedControl

This is control that has a checkbox with a combobox next to it. When the checkbox is checked/unchecked the combobox is enabled/disabled.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Used to construct the control with the given parameters.

Parameters:
con_title - The title for this control.
isChecked - True if the checkbox should be initially checked and false if it shouldn't be.
label - The label displayed next to the checkbox on this control.
fields - The values displayed in the combobox.
